frontend

Class Face

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.layout.Region
          • javafx.scene.layout.Pane
            • javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane
              • frontend.Face
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class Face
extends javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane
implements java.io.Serializable
    Author:
    Ivan Manoilov(xmanoi00), Farrukh Abdukhalikov(xabduk00)

    A facade responsible for communication of frontend package with outer package.

    See Also:
    Block, Serialized Form
